item.title: RemoteControl v1.1.2.4
item.description:
Product: RemoteControl v1.1.2.4
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Tue, 23 Apr 2024 22:28:25 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Parent library for sending messages to programs occupying different application instances, ie, LabVIEW running on different computers, multiple instances of LabVIEW on a single computer, or compiled applications. By itself this library does not implement a specific or even working communication protocol, but provides abstract methods that can be overridden by, for example, ZMQ, MQTT, etc.

Release Notes: [1.1.2]
- bug fixes to Test VIs
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: LV-Data v3.7.1.3
item.description:
Product: LV-Data v3.7.1.3
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 23 Feb 2024 15:10:05 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Collection of VIs to write and read TDMS, Igor Text Files (*.itx), text-based spreadsheet data files (*.dat), postgreSQL. Tools are also provided for uploading to and downloading from AWS S3.

Release Notes: [3.7.1]
- Issue #107: Update Read Variable polymorphic:
- check if incoming connection is empty before deciding to connect
- double, integer, boolean, all now call string as a subVI

- Issue #108: v2 database:
- List Tables, Get Table Path, Create Table, Rename Table all compatible with v2 database structure (table_index --> hypertables, path --> hypertable, llab_ --> _llab_) and backwards compatible with v1
- #109: wavenames were not being sanitized for 2D datasets
- #110: Excessive number of plots exceed command limit. If greater than 2500 B eliminate the command from the ITX file
- #111: Fix KillWaves command (mistyped as Kill Waves)
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Instrument Framework v1.14.0.10
item.description:
Product: Instrument Framework v1.14.0.10
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 05 Jan 2024 13:19:52 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: An object-oriented framework based on JKI SMOs, developed by the LevyLab at the University of Pittsburgh.

An Instrument developed using this framework will have the access to the following capabilities:

- Framework for communicating with hardware (Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL))
- Periodically polls the instrument for its settings and logs them to a PGSQL database
- Defines an API to allow external programs to control compiled instances of the application and remotely across a network (Either NI's Simple Messaging Library (STM) (deprecated in v1.9) or cross-platform protocol ZMQ (preferred beginning with v1.9))
- Provide a user interface (optional but probably desirable).
- Methods for reading and writing configuration from disk.

Release Notes: [1.14.0]
beta 1-6: This is a major release that will break your existing code, but hopefully will not be too painful to fix.
beta 7-8: Change handling of logging data
beta 9 : Add Instrument.lvlib, updated LockinAPI (Issue #100)
beta 10-: lvlib no bueno for the classes. re-linking hell... try without (keep for enum <> string.vim)
- Subsystems used by the Instrument Framework are now packaged separately (Configuration, RemoteControl, Logger, etc)
- Issue #91: improved API style and uniformity. The included "abstract" or "interface" methods (ie Instrument.Cryostat.lvclass) do more to enforce a standard command format and params datatype for child overrides. This uniformity will more easily enable calls from external languages (Python, etc)
- Instrument.LockinAPI.lvclass is now a fully-supported Interface class
- Instrument.SCPI iprovides a uniform way to send and receive arbitrary SCPI commands
- Issue #92: Consolidate methods to flatten/unflatten message data
- Issue #95: Time interval for logging instrument status is now an overridable parameter
- Issue #96: Minimize the number of malleable VIs. Save memory and minimize headaches. Local Client.vi and Remote Client.vi are not longer malleable VIs. Rename to RemoteClient and LocalClient
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: RemoteControl.ZMQ v1.1.0.6
item.description:
Product: RemoteControl.ZMQ v1.1.0.6
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 14 Dec 2023 10:31:49 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Override library implementing ZMQ lazy pirate reliable request reply (RRR) protocal using RemoteControl SMO framework.

Release Notes: [1.1.0]
- Updated to work with JSON-RPC v1.1
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: RemoteControl v1.1.1.3
item.description:
Product: RemoteControl v1.1.1.3
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 14 Dec 2023 10:24:48 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Parent library for sending messages to programs occupying different application instances, ie, LabVIEW running on different computers, multiple instances of LabVIEW on a single computer, or compiled applications. By itself this library does not implement a specific or even working communication protocol, but provides abstract methods that can be overridden by, for example, ZMQ, MQTT, etc.

Release Notes: [1.1.1]
- Change names Remote Client to RemoteControl.Remote Client, Variant to Data.vim to RemoteControl.Variant to Data.vim
- Change reentrancy of Connect and Disconnect

item.title: General AFM Lithography v10.1.1.3
item.description:
Product: General AFM Lithography v10.1.1.3
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 14 Dec 2023 09:50:38 -0500
Packager: Feng Bi, Akash Levy, Joe Albro, Patrick Irvin

Description: General AFM Lithography software used by the LevyLab research group at the University of Pittsburgh.

Release Notes: [10.1.1]
- Issue #99: Fix UI refresh issue
